import React, { useContext, useState } from "react" import { ThemeContext } from "../themeContext" import axios from "axios" import Form from "./Form" function UglyItem(props) { const blankInfo = { title: "", imgUrl: props.item?.title || "", description: "", isEditing: false } const [inputData, setInputData] = useState(blankInfo) const context = useContext(ThemeContext) function toggleEdit() { setInputData(prevState => ({ isEditing: !prevState.isEditing })) } return ( <> {inputData.isEditing === false ? <>

{props.title}

{props.description}

{props.id}

:
} ) } export default UglyItem
